title: Machine Learning-Based Recruitment Quality Assessment Simulation Course

context.prior_knowledge: Fundamental statistical analysis skills and understanding of HR processes
context.additional_context: Decision-making training and experiential learning through VR simulations of real-world recruitment data analysis environments

learning_goals: Learners will be able to explain three recruitment quality evaluation metrics based on P-E Fit Theory.
Participants will be able to perform candidate clustering simulations using the PAM clustering algorithm.
Learners will be able to design a candidate selection process with four or more stages based on analytical results.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
